maqras.text: 90|1|yeung( a l laoh) sbath nung tikrong nih( tikrong mea kkah) .
90|2|khn del anak( mou ham meat) chea anak del rsanow knong tikrong nih .
90|3|haey trong ban sbath nung aupouk mnoussa lok( a da) ning  anak del ban kaet( kaunchaw robsa keat) .
90|4|chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok aoy sthetnow  knong pheap lombak .
90|5|tae ke kitthea  kmean anaknea ach mean anoupheap leu khluon ke te ryy
90|6|daoy ke niyeay tha  khnhom ban chamnay tropy sa mb tde yeang  chraen .
90|7|tae ke kitthea  kmean norna mneak bankheunh ke te ryy
90|8|tae yeung minban bangkeut ke aoy mean phnek muoykou
90|9|ning andat muoy  haeyning bbaurmat te ryy
90|10|haey yeung themtang ban changaoulobangheanh meakra pir(la ning  akrak) dl ke tiet phng .
90|11|te ke minban daer now leu meakra del lombak( meakra tow  kan pheap chokchy) laey .
90|12|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  meakra del lombak chea avei noh
90|13|ku kar daohleng khnhom bamreu dachthlai aoy mean setthi seripheap .
90|14|ryy phdal chamneiahar nowknong thngai muoy del mean kroh tourphiksa .
90|15|( ryy phdal chamneiahar dl) kaunkamprea del chea nheatesandean .
90|16|ryy anak kreikr del kmeanoavei saoh .
90|17|banteabmk  ke ban klaycha mnoussa mneak knongchamnaom anak  del mean chomnue  ning ban phdephdam knea aoy meankar atthmot  haeyning ban  phdephdam knea aoy mean kdei me tda krounea .
90|18|anak teangnoh kuchea krom del ttuol banhchi daoy daisdam .
90|19|haey puok del kmean chomnue nung ayeat  robsa yeung puok  ke kuchea puok del ttuol banhchi daoy dai che  v ng .
90|20|phleung nork krobadandab leu puokke yeang chit .
91|1|a l laoh sbath nung preahatity  ning rosmei da trachahtrachng  robsa vea now pelopruk .
91|2|ning preah chnt nowpel del vea ban reah laeng banteabpi preahatity lich  .
91|3|ning pelothngai nowpel del preahatity ban b po  ch nh ponlu .
91|4|ning peloyb nowpel del vea ban krobadandab preahatity .
91|5|ning mekh  ning anak del ban bangkeut vea .
91|6|ning phendei  ning anak del ban leat sa nu  th ng vea .
91|7|ning roubreang( a da)  ning anak del ban thveu aoy ke mean lokkhan  samoromy .
91|8|ruochamk trong ban changaoulobangheanh dl ke aoy skal nouv ampeutouchcharit  ning ampeu so chch ri t robsa ke .
91|9|anak del saamatakhluon ke( daoy sang ampeula)  pitchea ttuol  ban chokchy .
91|10|haey anak del ban thveu aoy khluon ke kakhvak( daoy sang ampeu  akrak) pitchea ban khatabng .
91|11|krom sa mou d ban bdeseth( anakneasar robsa puokke)daoy  sar karbampean robsa puokke .
91|12|nowpel del chn kamnach bamphot knongchamnaom puokke ban  chenh mk( samleabsatv audth nhi) .
91|13|pelnoh anakneasar robsa a l laoh( sa leh)ban  pol towkean puokke tha ( chaur brongobraytn champoh) satv audth nhi  robsa a l laoh  haey kom reareang dl kar phoek robsa vea aoy saoh .

91|14|te puokke ban bdeseth nung keat  ning ban samleab vea . pel  noh mcheasa robsa puokke ban bamphlanh puokke daoysaarte babakamm robsa puokke .  haey trong ban theu  v aoy puokke vineasa a nd reay teangoasaknea .
91|15|haey trong min khlach lotthophl chongokraoy robsa puokke ( del trong ban daktondakamm leu puokke) noh laey .
92|1|a l laoh sbath nung peloyb nowpel del vea krobadandab  daoy pheap ngngut .
92|2|ning pelothngai  pel del vea ban b po  ch nh ponlu da trachahtrachng .
92|3|ning anak del ban bangkeut aoy mean brosa  ning srei .
92|4|pitabrakd nasa  kar broengobreng robsa puok anak(nowknong  lokey)  ku khosa  knea .
92|5|chamnek e anaknea del ban brichcheaktean  ning kaotakhlach  a l laoh
92|6|haeyning mean chomnue leu kar tabasnang la noh
92|7|yeung nung riebcham aoy ke nouv meakra del ngeayosruol
92|8|rie anaknea haey del kamnanh  ning min trauvkar chomnuoy pi  a l laoh
92|9|haeyning ban bdeseth nung kar tabasnang la noh
92|10|yeung nung riebcham aoy ke nouv meakra del lombak .
92|11|haey tropy sa mb tde robsa ke min phdal phalobrayoch dl  ke laey  nowpel delke ban thleak chaul tow knong nork haey noh .
92|12|pitabrakd nasa  phearkechch robsa yeung ku phdal kar changaoulobangheanh .
92|13|haey pitabrakd nasa  thngai avsan nei lokey  ning thngai dambaung nei lokey  kuchea kammosetthi robsa yeung .
92|14|dau che  neah  yeung ban dasatuen promean puok anak ampi phleung nork  del cheh santhosanthow
92|15|del kmean anaknea chaul tow knong noh  krawpi chn touchcharit
92|16|delke ban bdeseth( nung anakneasar)  ning ban berchenh ( pi chomnue leu a l laoh) noh laey .
92|17|haey ke nung banhchiesa anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ampi vea( nork)
92|18|del brichcheak tropy sa mb tde robsa ke daembi saamatakhluon .
92|19|haey ke min trauvkar kar tabasnang nie k meat pi anaknea mneak  laey .
92|20|leuklengte daembi svengork kar ylprom pi mcheasa robsa  ke da mha utdongk utdam bonnaoh .
92|21|haey ke pitchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan( avei del yeung  tabasnang dl ke) .
93|1|a l laoh sbath nung pelopruk .
93|2|ning peloyb  nowpel del vea ngngut .
93|3|mcheasa robsa anak( ao mou ham meat)  minban baohbng anak ning  minban saabkhpaem anak laey .
93|4|chea karpit nasa  thngai barlok brasaer samreab anak cheang lokey nih towtiet .
93|5|haey mcheasa robsa anak pitchea nung bratan( nie k meat)aoy  anak .  haey anak brakadchea nung penh chetd cheaminkhan .
93|6|tae trong min bankheunh anak( mou ham meat) chea kaunkamprea  ning ban  theroksaa anak te ryy
93|7|haey trong bankheunh anak v nge  vng  ruoch trong ban changaoulobangheanh  phlauv dl anak te ryy
93|8|haey trong bankheunh anakchea anakakr  ruoch trong ban thveu aoy anak  mean ban te ryy
93|9|dau che  neah  chaur anak kom kiebasangkot champoh kaunkamprea aoy saoh .
93|10|haey chaur anak kom koumhk champoh anaksomtean aoy saoh .
93|11|rie nie k meat del mcheasa robsa anak ban bratan aoy noh  chaur anak riebreab( doengkoun) .
